alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 3:40AM MST until January 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and some blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting up to 35 MPH. * WHERE...Laramie Valley including Laramie and Rock River. * WHEN...6 AM MST this morning until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
